attributes.action: Help to bring back/repatriate up to 500 medical staff in Australia back to UK.
attributes.additional_details: I've spoken to people in Australia who are now finding it impossible to get flights back over to the UK and would look to the government to maybe organise some emergency flights to get them back to the UK.
attributes.background: Organise flights to bring back and/or repatriate up to 500 medical staff including nurses, doctors and paramedics from Australia to the UK to help with the current situation surrounding Covid-19 and our overloaded health system.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307260

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
